amendment.description: To postpone the 2005 round of defense base closure and realignment.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1489 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Amendment SA 1489 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S8773; text: CR S8773) To postpone the 2005 round of defense base closure and realignment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1489 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Thune.
